Name: BgmProhibitArea
Notes: An area that sets the MuteGroup of the currently playing BGM to state 8 when entered, if used in Deep Dark Galaxy (OceanPhantomCaveGalaxy). State 8 of BGM_GALAXY_05 (Deep Dark's music) is set to lower the volume to 0, effectively muting it. It resets to State 1 when leaving the area. This area is likely an early development leftover and its effect can easily be achieved with a ChangeBgmCube as well.
